subject: Barbaro (Race Horse)
Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Preakness Stakes
Horses
Fast Food Industry
lead_paragraph: Offering a $1 million bonus to a horse that wins by more than 6-and-a-half lengths is a gimmick that debases the name of Barbaro.
snippet: Offering a $1 million bonus to a horse that wins by more than 6-and-a-half lengths is a gimmick that debases the name of Barbaro.
